verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H1732><s%>, when David dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%>, that David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Nathan <S%H5416><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, Lo <S%H3427><s%>, I dwell in a house <S%H1004><s%> of cedar <S%H730><s%>, but the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> dwelleth under curtains <S%H3407><s%>.
And Nathan <S%H5416><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>, Do <S%H6213><s%> all that is in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>; for God is with thee <S%H430><s%>.
And it came to pass the same night <S%H3915><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came to Nathan <S%H5416><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Go <S%H3212><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Thou shalt not build <S%H1129><s%> me a house <S%H1004><s%> to dwell in <S%H3427><s%>:

for I have not dwelt in <S%H3427><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> since the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought up <S%H5927><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, but have gone from tent <S%H168><s%> to tent <S%H168><s%>, and from one tabernacle to another <S%H4908><s%>.

In all places wherein I have walked <S%H1980><s%> with all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, spake <S%H1696><s%> I a word <S%H1697><s%> with any <S%H259><s%> of the judges <S%H8199><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whom I commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be shepherd <S%H7462><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Why have ye not built <S%H1129><s%> me a house <S%H1004><s%> of cedar <S%H730><s%>?

Now therefore thus shalt thou say <S%H559><s%> unto my servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, I took <S%H3947><s%> thee from the sheepcote <S%H5116><s%>, from following <S%H310><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%>, that thou shouldest be prince <S%H5057><s%> over my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

and I have been with thee whithersoever thou hast gone <S%H1980><s%>, and have cut off <S%H3772><s%> all thine enemies <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H6213><s%>; and I will make thee a name <S%H8034><s%>, like unto the name <S%H8034><s%> of the great ones <S%H1419><s%> that are in the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And I will appoint <S%H7760><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and will plant <S%H5193><s%> them <S%H7931><s%>, that they may dwell in their own place <S%H7264><s%>, and be moved no more <S%H1121><s%>; neither shall the children of wickedness <S%H5766><s%> waste <S%H1086><s%> them any more <S%H3254><s%>, as at the first <S%H7223><s%>,

and as from the day <S%H3117><s%> that I commanded <S%H6680><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> to be over my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and I will subdue <S%H3665><s%> all thine enemies <S%H341><s%>. Moreover I tell <S%H5046><s%> thee that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will build <S%H1129><s%> thee a house <S%H1004><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H3117><s%>, when thy days are fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> that thou must go <S%H3212><s%> to be with thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, that I will set up <S%H6965><s%> thy seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> thee <S%H1121><s%>, who shall be of thy sons; and I will establish <S%H3559><s%> his kingdom <S%H4438><s%>.
He shall build <S%H1129><s%> me a house <S%H1004><s%>, and I will establish <S%H3559><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

I will be his father <S%H1><s%>, and he shall be my son <S%H1121><s%>: and I will not take <S%H5493><s%> my lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> from him <S%H5493><s%>, as I took it from him that was before thee <S%H6440><s%>;

but I will settle <S%H5975><s%> him in my house <S%H1004><s%> and in my kingdom <S%H4438><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>; and his throne <S%H3678><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.
According to all these words <S%H1697><s%>, and according to all this vision <S%H2377><s%>, so did Nathan <S%H5416><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>.

Then David <S%H1732><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in <S%H3427><s%>, and sat before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and he said <S%H559><s%>, Who am I <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah God <S%H430><s%>, and what is my house <S%H1004><s%>, that thou hast brought <S%H935><s%> me thus far <S%H1988><s%>?

And this was a small thing <S%H6994><s%> in thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>; but thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> for a great while to come <S%H7350><s%>, and hast regarded <S%H7200><s%> me according to the estate <S%H8448><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> of high degree <S%H4609><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%>.

What can <S%H3254><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> say yet more <S%H3254><s%> unto thee concerning the honor <S%H3519><s%> which is done to thy servant <S%H5650><s%>? for thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%>.

O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, for thy servant <S%H5650><s%>'s sake <S%H3820><s%>, and according to thine own heart, hast thou wrought <S%H6213><s%> all this greatness <S%H1420><s%>, to make known <S%H3045><s%> all these great things <S%H1420><s%>.
O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, there is none like thee <S%H430><s%>, neither is there any God besides <S%H2108><s%> thee <S%H8085><s%>, according to all that we have heard with our ears <S%H241><s%>.

And what one <S%H259><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> is like thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whom God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to redeem <S%H6299><s%> unto himself for a people <S%H5971><s%>, to make <S%H7760><s%> thee a name <S%H8034><s%> by great <S%H1420><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> things <S%H1644><s%>, in driving out nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%>, whom thou redeemest <S%H6299><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>?

For thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> didst thou make <S%H5414><s%> thine own people <S%H5971><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>; and thou <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, becamest their God <S%H430><s%>.

And now <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, let the word <S%H1697><s%> that thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> concerning thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, and concerning his house <S%H1004><s%>, be established <S%H539><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> as thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

And let thy name <S%H8034><s%> be established <S%H539><s%> and magnified <S%H1431><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, even a God <S%H430><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> is established <S%H3559><s%> before thee <S%H6440><s%>.

For thou <S%H430><s%>, O my God, hast revealed <S%H1540><s%> to thy servant <S%H5650><s%> that thou wilt build <S%H1129><s%> him a house <S%H1004><s%>: therefore hath thy servant <S%H5650><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> in his heart to pray <S%H6419><s%> before thee <S%H6440><s%>.
And now <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, thou art God <S%H430><s%>, and hast promised <S%H1696><s%> this good <S%H2896><s%> thing unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%>:

and now it hath pleased <S%H2974><s%> thee to bless <S%H1288><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, that it may continue for ever <S%H5769><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H3068><s%>: for thou, O Jehovah, hast blessed <S%H1288><s%>, and it is blessed <S%H1288><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
